channel.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
channel.description:
Okay well 200 messages is the normal max I am assuming. However...
http://snpr.cm/iYWsqf.png
thanks mods made my day. Now this gets me thinking though as well.. if my inbox is maxed a 200 but gets 201 does that make the mods glitchers? <3

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Nope, your warning level just fell down, you was only put up by 35%

Read full topic

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

To be honest I probably did lol everyone knows I am a troll (not that I am wanting to be moderated just simply stating ) the warning system is so … basic. I will write up a suggestion later tonight.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:437915”]It’s because your special t4<3

I am now watched ? 0.o I thought somebody told me that a moderated status meant like 40% warning and it took two days to bring it down to 30%? 0.o[/quote]
It was most likely discussed upon the moderators and they came to the conclusion that you didn’t deserve such a high warning.

Read full topic

i guess i’m lucky

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Stupit:

Did like everyone just get moderated or is it just me? I just got online and found out I was moderated for no god damn reason at all. Like if I was doing something wrong, the mods could of let me known and I would of fixed it.

I was warned by Si Force for agreeing with a person an it made me rage.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:6, topic:437915”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=540632.msg3959508#msg3959508 date=1333141084]

I think those messages are sent automatically (if we tick the box) when we issue a warning, so it’s not sent by us personally.

On a side note, us mods can have as many pms as we want

David’s is usually filled to the point you can’t even message him though?
[/quote]
Hm, not sure then, I’ve got 53 pages full of pms and I have no percentage bar so I assumed it was practically unlimited

Did like everyone just get moderated or is it just me? I just got online and found out I was moderated for no god damn reason at all. Like if I was doing something wrong, the mods could of let me known and I would of fixed it.

Notes say you were advertising in your sig, that’s a little out of order though david…[/quote]
I agree, I wasn’t warned at all. Quite silly in my opinion though.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:5, topic:437915”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=540632.msg3959488#msg3959488 date=1333140070]
I think those messages are sent automatically (if we tick the box) when we issue a warning, so it’s not sent by us personally.

On a side note, us mods can have as many pms as we want
[/quote]
David’s is usually filled to the point you can’t even message him though?[/quote]
Hm, not sure then, I’ve got 53 pages full of pms and I have no percentage bar so I assumed it was practically unlimited

Stupit:

Did like everyone just get moderated or is it just me? I just got online and found out I was moderated for no god damn reason at all. Like if I was doing something wrong, the mods could of let me known and I would of fixed it.

Notes say you were advertising in your sig, that’s a little out of order though david…

Read full topic

item.title: Funny moparscape pm glitch
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Then consider it a suggestion to make it so warnings/infraction notices should be sent as “hidden messages” that don’t count as private messages. By doing it this way we don’t have to worry about those “impossible 100.5%” moments xD

I will have to tell my math teacher there is such a thing as “104% positive” now. He used to tell me you can’t say “200%” etc.

Read full topic
